Deep Insight

Deep Insight is the first dedicated fund in Israel focused on deep tech opportunities across all stages. They invest in various sectors including semiconductors, bio convergence, and robotics, among others. Their stage-agnostic approach allows them to support companies throughout their growth journey.

Offices: Herzliya (Israel)

Investment Stages: Series A, Series B, Series C

Markets: Semiconductors, Bio Convergence, Future Robotics, Advanced Materials, Photonics, Quantum Technologies

Founded Year: 2021

Investor Type: Venture Capital

Portfolio Companies: TriEye, Rapid, Ramon.Space, Aviv Scientific, Biond Biologics, Addionics, Bionaut, MediWound, Alpha Tau Medical, Magnus Metal, Exsilio, GreenEye

Website: https://www.deepinsight.co.il

Team Page: https://www.deepinsight.co.il/#team

Portfolio Link: https://www.deepinsight.co.il/#portfolio

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/deep-insightfund

Twitter:

Instagram:

Crunchbase: https://www.crunchbase.com/organization/deep-insight-6269

Pitchbook: https://pitchbook.com/profiles/investor/466794-28
